fool.name: The Fool
fool.meaning: Represents new beginnings, infinite possibilities, and the courage to face the unknown.
fool.reverseMeaning: Recklessness, carelessness, being taken advantage of.

magician.name: The Magician
magician.meaning: Represents willpower, skill, and the ability to turn ideas into action.
magician.reverseMeaning: Trickery, illusions, out of touch, manipulation.

priestess.name: The High Priestess
priestess.meaning: Represents intuition, sacred knowledge, and the subconscious mind.
priestess.reverseMeaning: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal and silence.

empress.name: The Empress
empress.meaning: Represents femininity, motherhood, fertility, and abundance.
empress.reverseMeaning: Creative block, dependence on others, emptiness.

emperor.name: The Emperor
emperor.meaning: Represents authority, structure, control, and fatherly energy.
emperor.reverseMeaning: Domination, excessive control, lack of discipline, inflexibility.

hierophant.name: The Hierophant
hierophant.meaning: Represents tradition, conformity, and established institutions.
hierophant.reverseMeaning: Rebellion, non-conformity, new approaches, personal beliefs.

lovers.name: The Lovers
lovers.meaning: Represents love, relationships, harmony, and important choices.
lovers.reverseMeaning: Disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values, conflict.

chariot.name: The Chariot
chariot.meaning: Represents willpower, determination, and overcoming obstacles through self-control.
chariot.reverseMeaning: Lack of control and direction, aggression, self-discipline.

strength.name: Strength
strength.meaning: Represents inner strength, courage, compassion, and self-control.
strength.reverseMeaning: Weakness, self-doubt, lack of self-discipline, raw emotion.

hermit.name: The Hermit
hermit.meaning: Represents introspection, soul-searching, and inner guidance.

fortune.name: Wheel of Fortune
fortune.meaning: Represents destiny, turning points, and the cycles of life.
fortune.reverseMeaning: Bad luck, resistance to change, breaking cycles.

justice.name: Justice
justice.meaning: Represents fairness, truth, and cause and effect.
justice.reverseMeaning: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonesty, injustice.

hanged.name: The Hanged Man
hanged.meaning: Represents suspension, new perspectives, and sacrifice.
hanged.reverseMeaning: Stalling, needless sacrifice, resistance to letting go.

death.name: Death
death.meaning: Represents an end, transformation, and new beginnings, not literal death.
death.reverseMeaning: Resistance to change, personal transformation, inner purging.

temperance.name: Temperance
temperance.meaning: Represents balance, moderation, and finding a middle ground.
temperance.reverseMeaning: Imbalance, excess, extremes, lack of long-term vision.

devil.name: The Devil
devil.meaning: Represents addiction, materialism, and being trapped by your own limitations.

tower.name: The Tower
tower.meaning: Represents sudden upheaval, chaos, and revelation.
tower.reverseMeaning: Avoidance of disaster, fear of change, personal transformation.

star.name: The Star
star.meaning: Represents hope, inspiration, and spiritual guidance.
star.reverseMeaning: Lack of faith, despair, discouragement, disconnection.

moon.name: The Moon
moon.meaning: Represents illusion, fear, and the subconscious.
moon.reverseMeaning: Release of fear, repressed emotion, inner confusion.

sun.name: The Sun
sun.reverseMeaning: Inner child, feeling down, overly optimistic.

judgement.name: Judgement
judgement.meaning: Represents rebirth, a spiritual awakening, and a call to a higher purpose.
judgement.reverseMeaning: Self-doubt, inner critic, ignoring the call.

cups_ace.name: Ace of Cups
cups_ace.meaning: Represents new beginnings in love, emotions, and creativity. A new relationship or a deeper connection is emerging.

cups_2.name: Two of Cups
cups_2.meaning: Represents a deep connection, partnership, and mutual respect. It often signifies a romantic relationship but can also be a strong friendship or business partnership.

cups_3.name: Three of Cups
cups_3.meaning: Represents celebrations, friendship, and creative collaborations. It's a time of happy gatherings and shared joy.
cups_3.reverseMeaning: An affair, "three's a crowd", isolation, gossip.

cups_4.name: Four of Cups
cups_4.meaning: Represents apathy, contemplation, and being offered something that doesn't excite you. A need to re-evaluate.
cups_4.reverseMeaning: Sudden awareness, choosing happiness, letting go of regret, ending boredom.

cups_5.name: Five of Cups
cups_5.meaning: Represents loss, regret, and focusing on what has gone wrong rather than the opportunities that remain.
cups_5.reverseMeaning: Moving on, acceptance, finding forgiveness, seeing the positive.

cups_6.name: Six of Cups
cups_6.meaning: Represents nostalgia, childhood memories, and the happiness of the past. It can also mean a reunion with someone from your past.
cups_6.reverseMeaning: Stuck in the past, moving forward, leaving home, rose-tinted glasses.

cups_7.name: Seven of Cups
cups_7.meaning: Represents having many choices and opportunities, but also the danger of illusion, fantasy, and wishful thinking.
cups_7.reverseMeaning: Temptation, illusion, diversionary tactics, lack of purpose.

cups_8.name: Eight of Cups
cups_8.meaning: Represents walking away from a situation that is no longer emotionally fulfilling. A journey of self-discovery.
cups_8.reverseMeaning: Trying one more time, indecision, aimless drifting, fear of the unknown.

cups_9.name: Nine of Cups
cups_9.meaning: Often called the "wish card," it represents satisfaction, contentment, and wishes coming true.

cups_10.name: Ten of Cups
cups_10.meaning: Represents ultimate emotional fulfillment, happy family life, and harmonious relationships.
cups_10.reverseMeaning: Broken home or marriage, disharmony, unhappiness, misalignment of values.

cups_page.name: Page of Cups
cups_page.meaning: Represents a messenger of creative opportunities and emotional messages. A time for curiosity and intuition.
cups_page.reverseMeaning: New ideas, doubting intuition, creative blocks, emotional immaturity.

cups_knight.name: Knight of Cups
cups_knight.meaning: Represents romance, charm, and following one's heart. He is a messenger of love and creative inspiration.

cups_queen.name: Queen of Cups
cups_queen.meaning: Represents a compassionate, intuitive, and emotionally mature person. She is in tune with her feelings and those of others.
cups_queen.reverseMeaning: Emotional insecurity, co-dependency, martyrdom, being over-sensitive.

cups_king.name: King of Cups
cups_king.meaning: Represents emotional mastery, compassion, and diplomacy. He is a master of his own feelings and a calm influence on others.

pentacles_ace.name: Ace of Pentacles
pentacles_ace.meaning: Represents a new opportunity for prosperity, abundance, and manifestation. A seed of wealth has been planted.
pentacles_ace.reverseMeaning: Lost opportunity, lack of planning, greed, missed chance.

pentacles_2.name: Two of Pentacles
pentacles_2.meaning: Represents balancing priorities, adapting to change, and managing resources. Often involves juggling multiple tasks or financial matters.

pentacles_3.name: Three of Pentacles
pentacles_3.meaning: Represents teamwork, collaboration, and the successful completion of the initial phase of a project. Your skills are recognized.
pentacles_3.reverseMeaning: Disharmony, misalignment, working alone, poor quality work.

pentacles_4.name: Four of Pentacles
pentacles_4.meaning: Represents a desire for security and control, often through saving money or holding on tightly to possessions. Can indicate a scarcity mindset.
pentacles_4.reverseMeaning: Over-spending, greed, self-protection, letting go of control.

pentacles_5.name: Five of Pentacles
pentacles_5.meaning: Represents financial hardship, poverty, and feeling left out in the cold. A time of worry and insecurity.
pentacles_5.reverseMeaning: Recovery from financial loss, spiritual poverty, forgiveness.

pentacles_6.name: Six of Pentacles
pentacles_6.meaning: Represents generosity, charity, and the flow of giving and receiving. It can mean receiving a gift or being in a position to help others.
pentacles_6.reverseMeaning: Debt, selfishness, one-sided charity, strings attached.

pentacles_7.name: Seven of Pentacles
pentacles_7.meaning: Represents a moment of reflection on a long-term project. A time to assess your progress and decide if the investment is paying off.
pentacles_7.reverseMeaning: Lack of long-term vision, limited success or reward, impatience.

pentacles_8.name: Eight of Pentacles
pentacles_8.meaning: Represents dedication to a craft, skill development, and mastery through hard work and attention to detail.
pentacles_8.reverseMeaning: Perfectionism, misdirected activity, lack of ambition, repetitive tasks.

pentacles_9.name: Nine of Pentacles
pentacles_9.meaning: Represents luxury, self-sufficiency, and enjoying the fruits of your labor. Financial independence and refined taste.

pentacles_10.name: Ten of Pentacles
pentacles_10.meaning: Represents long-term financial security, family wealth, and a lasting legacy. The culmination of success.
pentacles_10.reverseMeaning: Financial failure, loneliness, loss, fleeting success.

pentacles_page.name: Page of Pentacles
pentacles_page.meaning: Represents a new opportunity related to finances, work, or manifestation. A diligent and curious student.
pentacles_page.reverseMeaning: Lack of progress, procrastination, learn from failure, daydreaming.

pentacles_knight.name: Knight of Pentacles
pentacles_knight.meaning: Represents a methodical, hard-working, and reliable person. He achieves success through routine and persistence.

pentacles_queen.name: Queen of Pentacles
pentacles_queen.meaning: Represents a nurturing, practical, and down-to-earth person who provides for others. She is resourceful and creates a warm home environment.
pentacles_queen.reverseMeaning: Financial independence, self-care, work-home conflict, smothering.

pentacles_king.name: King of Pentacles
pentacles_king.meaning: Represents an enterprising and successful leader who has achieved wealth and abundance through discipline and hard work.
pentacles_king.reverseMeaning: Financially inept, obsessed with wealth and status, stubborn, corrupt.

swords_ace.name: Ace of Swords
swords_ace.meaning: Represents a new idea, a breakthrough in understanding, or a moment of mental clarity. The power of intellect to cut through confusion.
swords_ace.reverseMeaning: Confusion, chaos, lack of clarity, clouded judgment.

swords_2.name: Two of Swords
swords_2.meaning: Represents a stalemate or a difficult choice. A need to make a decision, but feeling blocked or unable to see the truth.
swords_2.reverseMeaning: Indecision, confusion, information overload, seeing the truth.

swords_3.name: Three of Swords
swords_3.meaning: Represents heartbreak, sorrow, and painful truth. A moment of deep emotional pain that leads to understanding.
swords_3.reverseMeaning: Negative self-talk, releasing pain, optimism, forgiveness.

swords_4.name: Four of Swords
swords_4.meaning: Represents a need for rest, contemplation, and recuperation. A time to withdraw and recharge your mental batteries.

swords_5.name: Five of Swords
swords_5.meaning: Represents conflict, defeat, and winning at all costs. A situation where ambition leads to discord and loss for others.
swords_5.reverseMeaning: Reconciliation, making amends, past resentment, desire to end conflict.

swords_6.name: Six of Swords
swords_6.meaning: Represents a transition, moving from a difficult situation to a calmer one. A journey towards a better future.
swords_6.reverseMeaning: Personal transition, resistance to change, unfinished business, trapped.

swords_7.name: Seven of Swords
swords_7.meaning: Represents deception, strategy, and trying to get away with something. It can indicate betrayal or acting alone.
swords_7.reverseMeaning: Imposter syndrome, deceiving yourself, keeping secrets, coming clean.

swords_8.name: Eight of Swords
swords_8.meaning: Represents feeling trapped and restricted, but these limitations are self-imposed. A need to change your perspective to find freedom.
swords_8.reverseMeaning: Self-acceptance, new perspective, releasing negative thoughts, freedom.

swords_9.name: Nine of Swords
swords_9.meaning: Represents anxiety, fear, and nightmares. A card of deep mental anguish and worry, often worse in the mind than in reality.
swords_9.reverseMeaning: Inner turmoil, deep-seated fears, secrets, releasing worry.

swords_10.name: Ten of Swords
swords_10.meaning: Represents a painful ending, betrayal, and hitting rock bottom. While devastating, it signals the end of a cycle and the chance for rebirth.
swords_10.reverseMeaning: Recovery, regeneration, resisting an inevitable end, learning from the past.

swords_page.name: Page of Swords
swords_page.meaning: Represents a curious, energetic, and communicative person with a thirst for knowledge. A time for new ideas and speaking your truth.
swords_page.reverseMeaning: Self-expression, all talk and no action, haphazard action, gossip.

swords_knight.name: Knight of Swords
swords_knight.meaning: Represents an ambitious, fast-thinking, and action-oriented person who charges forward to achieve their goals.

swords_queen.name: Queen of Swords
swords_queen.meaning: Represents an independent, intelligent, and clear-thinking person who uses unbiased judgment and sets firm boundaries.

swords_king.name: King of Swords
swords_king.meaning: Represents intellectual authority, truth, and mental clarity. A master of logic and reason who rules with fairness.
swords_king.reverseMeaning: Quiet power, inner truth, misuse of power, manipulation, tyrannical.

wands_ace.name: Ace of Wands
wands_ace.meaning: Represents a spark of inspiration, new opportunities, and the potential for growth. A time to take action and pursue your passion.
wands_ace.reverseMeaning: An emerging idea, lack of direction, distractions, delays.

wands_2.name: Two of Wands
wands_2.meaning: Represents future planning, making decisions, and discovering your path. You have achieved something and are now looking to the future.
wands_2.reverseMeaning: Fear of unknown, lack of planning, personal goals, playing it safe.

wands_3.name: Three of Wands
wands_3.meaning: Represents progress, expansion, and looking ahead with foresight. Your plans are coming to fruition.
wands_3.reverseMeaning: Playing small, lack of foresight, unexpected delays, obstacles to long-term goals.

wands_4.name: Four of Wands
wands_4.meaning: Represents celebration, harmony, and a happy homecoming. A time of joy and stability.
wands_4.reverseMeaning: Personal celebration, inner harmony, conflict with others, transition.

wands_5.name: Five of Wands
wands_5.meaning: Represents conflict, competition, and disagreements. A clash of ideas and opinions, but often in a low-stakes or creative context.
wands_5.reverseMeaning: Inner conflict, conflict avoidance, striving for harmony, releasing tension.

wands_6.name: Six of Wands
wands_6.meaning: Represents victory, public recognition, and success. You have overcome challenges and are being celebrated for your achievements.
wands_6.reverseMeaning: Private achievement, personal definition of success, fall from grace, egotism.

wands_7.name: Seven of Wands
wands_7.meaning: Represents standing your ground, defending your position, and persevering through challenges.
wands_7.reverseMeaning: Giving up, overwhelmed, overly protective, feeling attacked.

wands_8.name: Eight of Wands
wands_8.meaning: Represents rapid movement, action, and communication. Things are happening quickly and progress is being made.
wands_8.reverseMeaning: Delays, frustration, resisting change, slowing down.

wands_9.name: Nine of Wands
wands_9.meaning: Represents resilience, courage, and persistence in the face of adversity. You are wounded but not defeated.
wands_9.reverseMeaning: Inner resources, struggle, overwhelm, defensive, paranoia.

wands_10.name: Ten of Wands
wands_10.meaning: Represents carrying a heavy burden, taking on too much responsibility, and the stress of hard work.
wands_10.reverseMeaning: Doing it all, carrying the burden, delegation, release.

wands_page.name: Page of Wands
wands_page.meaning: Represents enthusiasm, exploration, and a free spirit. A messenger of new ideas and creative energy.
wands_page.reverseMeaning: Newly-formed ideas, redirecting energy, self-limiting beliefs, lack of direction.

wands_knight.name: Knight of Wands
wands_knight.meaning: Represents energy, passion, and impulsive action. He is adventurous and eager to pursue his goals.
wands_knight.reverseMeaning: Passion project, haste, scattered energy, delays, frustration.

wands_queen.name: Queen of Wands
wands_queen.meaning: Represents a courageous, confident, and determined person who is a social butterfly and a source of inspiration.
wands_queen.reverseMeaning: Self-respect, self-confidence, introverted, a shrinking violet, aggressive.

wands_king.name: King of Wands
wands_king.meaning: Represents a natural-born leader with a clear vision. He is charismatic, honorable, and inspires others to follow him.
wands_king.reverseMeaning: Impulsiveness, haste, ruthless, high expectations, tyrannical.

journalEditor.contentPlaceholder: Start writing your tarot journal... Use #t-fool to insert The Fool card, #l-rider to insert The Rider card
journalEditor.startTyping: Start typing to see a preview...

toast.addTagsFirst: Please add Tarot card tags in the content first (e.g., #t-fool, #t-magician)
toast.aiSuccessDescription: AI interpretation suggestion has been generated.
